      • int64

        public static long int64(int n,
         int k)
        求有幾種組合情況的方法數.
        C(n,k)
        C(0,0)=1, C(1,0)=1, C(0,1)=0
        C(0,-2) will throw Exception.
        The number of ways of combination of the two input numbers (0 <= k <= n)
